UT MBA Recruiting Cc All Recruiting season is upon us again This should be a fun and hopefully fruitful Fall for selling Enron to the UT MBA class of There are many events scheduled for the Fall ranging from informal happy hours and a tailgate to the more structured campus presentations and interviews Additionally there will be several opportunities to cultivate relationships with candidates and professors Below is a list of important dates You may have received this a week ago from Kristin Gandy Kristin who was the recruiter for UT MBA Spring recruiting has moved to a commercial position within Enron and will no longer be our recruiter Taking Kristins place is Lexi Elliott Lexi has recruited with the Associate Analyst Program for several years During this time Lexis responsibilities included UT Undergraduate recruiting Lexi is familiar with UT the campus administration and the logistics for recruiting in Austin She will be a great asset for our team Do not hesitate to notify Lexi or me about your level of interest and ability to be involved with the Fall effort Note that the first event is days away Important Dates August th UT First Year Orientation in Austin at Scholtz Biergarten starts around pm to pm September th Think Drink Sponsorship at Copper Tank from pm to am September th Corporate Presentation at Four Seasons Hotel in Austin from pm to pm September th MBA Coffees on campus from am to am September th Drop Date for Resumes September th Graduate Business Womens Network Golf Tournament Only open to Enron Women Sorry Guys September th Closed List Due to Career Management Center September st Eyes of Texas Career Fair at Frank Erwin Center from pm to pm September th UT Texas Tech Tailgate Party in Austin October nd Final Closed List Sent to Enron October rd MBA Coffees on campus from am to am October rd PreInterview Reception at Star Canyon in the InterContinental Steven F Austin Hotel from pm to pm October th First Round Interviews OnCampus in the Ford Center We have schedules with interview rooms and waitingrecruiter room October th Second Round Interviews OnCampus in the Ford Center We will have schedules with interview rooms and waitingrecruiter room November th Annual Finance Tournament at the McCombs School of Business All hotel rooms for the Presentation and Interviews have been booked at the InterContinental Stephen F Austin Summer Associates Who Are Happy To Help With Recruiting On Campus Vance Holtzman Randy Katz Kent Kuykendall Eric Schneider Austin Summerford Incoming Full Time Associates Who Started August th
